termsAndConditions.introduction: Welcome to Regal Haven. By using our website and booking services, you agree to the following Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services.

bookingPolicy.title: Booking Policy
content: To make a reservation, you must provide valid identification and payment details.
A booking is only confirmed once you receive a confirmation email.
Payments can be made through our secure online payment gateway or at the hostel upon arrival.

cancellationPolicy.title: Cancellation Policy
content: Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours in advance to receive a full refund.
If you cancel less than 24 hours before your check-in time, a cancellation fee of [insert amount] will be charged.

checkInOutPolicy.title: Check-In and Check-Out
content: Check-in is available from [insert time].
Check-out time is [insert time].
Early check-in or late check-out may incur additional charges, subject to availability.

behaviorPolicy.title: Behavior and Conduct
content: Guests must respect hostel policies, local laws, and other guests' comfort.
Any disruptive behavior may result in immediate expulsion from the hostel without a refund.

liability.title: Liability
content: We are not responsible for loss or damage to personal belongings during your stay.
We are not liable for any accidents or injuries that occur while staying at our hostel.

modification.title: Modification of Terms
content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time.
Any changes will be communicated to you via email or on our website.

privacyPolicy.introduction: At Regal Haven, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
content: Personal Information: We collect personal details such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment information when you make a booking.
Usage Data: We may collect information about how you use our website, such as IP addresses, browser type, and pages visited.

useOfData.title: How We Use Your Information
content: To process your bookings and provide you with customer support.
To send you confirmation emails and updates about your reservation.
To improve our services and website performance.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
content: We take appropriate measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.
However, please note that no data transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

sharingData.title: Sharing Your Information
content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties.
We may share your data with service providers (e.g., payment processors) to complete your bookings.

rights.title: Your Rights
content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time.
You can contact us to request these changes.

policyChanges.title: Changes to This Policy
content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time.
Any changes will be posted on this page, and we will notify you if significant updates are made.
